channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Table Builder -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Table Builder -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43125|2024-08-13T19:08:12.279Z -- wp%20table%20builder -- wp%20table%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20table%20plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Table Builder WP Table Builder – WordPress Table Plugin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Table Builder – WordPress Table Plugin: from n/a through 1.4.15.
